turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a coffee drink from starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, which location would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hmm..i think I want a caramel frap

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, i would like it with almond milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, it will be an additional 60 cents

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: okay, you can use my card on my starbucks app

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to leave a tip?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will do it myself after pickup

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay drink is on order at the local store on peachtree street and will be ready for pickup shortly and your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.
